page.title: 01OUR AREA RURAL CHELMSFORD
page.content: The area is mostly fields and farmland. At the northwest point is the G.E.C.Marconi Research Laboratory and at the southeast point are the Claydon Farms. Most of the farms are arable,growing corn,rape and a few peas. In May,where the rape has been planted, the fields are a brilliant yellow. A few of the farms have cattle,both for milk and meat and there are a small number of sheep.there are a few smallholdings. At least two of the farms were mentioned in the original Domesday Book. The land is flat with the occasional wood and pond. There are a couple of Pill Boxes in the fields left over from the Second World War.
